Package org.texgen.textures.pattern

Textures which are based on patterns and shapes

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BrickTexture Simple brick texture that uses 2 textures for the brick and mortar elements.
Checker Simple checker textures that toggles between two textures based on a checker pattern.
Fur Fur is a texture which takes a source texture and gives it a furry texture.
GridPattern Implements a grid by dicing the texture and calling the source texture for each cell with values for 0..1 for u,v values in each cell.
Mandelbrot Creates a mandelbrot texture with a gradient coloring.
Marble Returns a single marble element that is mostly transparent.
RoundedCornerTexture Creates a square with rounded corners (based on the radius) in the 0..1 space
 

Package org.texgen.textures.pattern Description

Textures which are based on patterns and shapes
